sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM tmpAPIExtractInvValBranch WHERE ISNUMERIC(BranchCode)=1 AND DistCode='@{item().DistributorCode}'
SELECT * FROM tmpAPIExtractInvValBranch WHERE ISNUMERIC(BranchCode)=1 AND DistCode='@{item().DistributorCode}'

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT
ISNULL([BranchSubdNodeId],0) [BranchSubdNodeId],
	ISNULL([StoreId],0) [StoreId],
	ISNULL([ChannelHierId],0) [ChannelHierId],
	ISNULL([SBDGroupId],0) [SBDGroupId],
	ISNULL([SBFNodeId],0) [SBFNodeId],
	ISNULL([PrdIdKey],0) [PrdIdKey],
	ISNULL([DSEIDKey],0) [DSEIDKey],
	ISNULL([SectorId],0) [SectorId],
	ISNULL([flgSBDCM],0) [flgSBDCM],
	ISNULL([flgSBDP2M],0) [flgSBDP2M],
	ISNULL([flgSBDP3M],0) [flgSBDP3M],
	ISNULL([Rptmonthyear],0) [Rptmonthyear],
	[MonthEndDate],
	ISNULL([flgSourceOfSale],0) [flgSourceOfSale],
	ISNULL([flgCustomerType],0) [flgCustomerType],
	ISNULL([SellerTypeId],0) [SellerTypeId],
	ISNULL([flgSBDCMSold],0) [flgSBDCMSold],
	ISNULL([flgSBDP2MSold],0) [flgSBDP2MSold],
	ISNULL([P3MNetSales],0) [P3MNetSales],
	ISNULL([P2MNetSales],0) [P2MNetSales],
	ISNULL([CMNetSales],0) [CMNetSales],
	ISNULL([flgSBDCMSold_QDGP],0) [flgSBDCMSold_QDGP],
	ISNULL([flgSBDP2MSold_QDGP],0) [flgSBDP2MSold_QDGP],
	ISNULL([flgSBDP3MSold_QDGP],0) [flgSBDP3MSold_QDGP],
	ISNULL([flgSBDP3MSold],0) [flgSBDP3MSold] 

	FROM tblFactSBDData_PCode WHERE RptMonthYear=202508
